programme.desc: Follow a fiercely determined snow leopard mother as she teaches her cub vital life lessons; watch a family of Tibetan fox face a formidable feline hunter to protect their precious young; and admire the stealth and agility of the one of the world's smallest cats.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms Of China
programme.desc: China's bamboo forest is full of secrets and surprises, including the legendary giant panda, red panda and Tibetan macaque, and a host of other unusual creatures such as the jewelled flower mantis, bamboo bats and moustached toads that have found ingenious ways to survive in this kingdom of giant grass.

programme.title: Asia's Killer Hornets
programme.desc: Every Asian giant hornet colony starts with a single queen. Leaving one hive to start another, she‚Äôll quickly transform an empty lair into a bustling army of ruthless, efficient killing machines. These hornets will sacrifice everything to help raise legions of grubs and protect the hive at all costs.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: From a harrowing farrowing to an emergency kidding, the vets pull off miracles! There‚Äôs no pause in paws as Dr. Brenda and Dr. Lisa treat a variety of foot injuries, including a Sheltie with broken toes. Dr. Pol examines a massive mastiff with tummy trouble and an injured rabbit. The Pol family add a pregnant Friesian mare to the herd and Dr. Nicole has her hands full with a rooster and a cat.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Tricky cases need PVS treatment during a spooky Halloween season! Dr. Pol aids a pot-bellied pig that was attacked by two dogs. A descendant of racehorse Secretariat has a problematic ear issue. A stalled laboring Lab brings a bunch of adorable puppies into the world. And, Dr. Pol helps a sweet kitten find a new home.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble! From brawling birds to hurting hooves, the vets swing into action mending paws, jaws, even a down on his luck duck. Doc wages an epic battle to save a cow struggling to give birth, Dr. Lisa treats a Husky hit by a truck, and Dr. Nicole examines a pack of puppies with a plethora of problems. The Pols welcome their newest fur baby, Christy, a rambunctious Bengal kitten.

programme.title: Asia's Killer Hornets
programme.desc: Every Asian giant hornet colony starts with a single queen. Leaving one hive to start another, she‚Äôll quickly transform an empty lair into a bustling army of ruthless, efficient killing machines. These hornets will sacrifice everything to help raise legions of grubs and protect the hive at all costs.

programme.title: Jaguars Vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner.

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Whale
programme.desc: Intelligent, cultured and deadly, the killer whale dominates every ocean on earth and as our planet changes, this top predator changes with it. They are elite, marine hunters with an extremely diverse diet including other apex predators like the great white shark. Killer whales pursue their prey like a pack of wolves and have multiple killing techniques. .

programme.title: Day Of The Dragon
programme.desc: The clock starts just before sunrise - when the temperature begins to rise. It‚Äôs hard work being the world‚Äôs biggest lizard on Rinca island. Competition is so fierce he can‚Äôt afford to slow down. For the biggest male on the island, an ever- warming environment and shrinking hunting grounds threaten his survival across every hour of the day.
